```{r setup, include=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(knitr)

knit_hooks$set(plot=function(x, options) {
  sprintf("<img src='../%s%s-%d.%s'/ title='%s'/>", 
          options$fig.path, options$label, options$fig.cur, options$fig.ext, options$fig.cap)

})

opts_chunk$set(
  echo=TRUE,
  fig.path="static/geoknife-troubleshoot/",
  fig.width = 6,
  fig.height = 6,
  fig.cap = "TODO",
  toggle = FALSE
)

knit_hooks$set(addToggle = function(before, options, envir) {
    if(before) {
      sprintf('<button class="ToggleButton" onclick="toggle_visibility(\'%1$s\')">Show Answer</button>
              <div id="%1$s" style="display:none">', opts_current$get('label'))
    } else {
      '</div>'
    }
})

set.seed(1)
```

To start, let's setup a geojob that fails.

```{r addToggle='ON'}
print('hello')
```

try one without a button

```{r eval=FALSE}
print('bonjour')
```

then a third with the button

```{r addToggle='ON'}
print('ciao')
```
